mainSequence.step: Business User registers for Fault Management notifications with the hub
System Operator Facility creates a Fault Management Job
Fault Management Job is transitioned to in-progress state
Fault Management Job generates necessary data
Fault Management Job creates a Fault Management Report
Fault Management Report is transitioned to in-progress state
Fault Management Report transitions to completed state
Fault Management Job receives the completed report
Fault Management Job schedules the next job
Fault Management Job transitions to completed or scheduled state
Business User requests to get the generated report
System Operator Facility retrieves and sends back the Fault Management Report
